      • updateGraph

        public void updateGraph​(java.util.List<org.nd4j.linalg.primitives.Pair<org.nd4j.linalg.api.ndarray.INDArray,​org.nd4j.linalg.api.ndarray.INDArray>> dataset,
                        java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Double> colors)
        Updates the graph with a new dataset.

        The method first clears the current data in the graph, and then adds the new data. Each cluster is added as a new series in the graph. Then, it sets the colours of the points

        Parameters:
        dataset - The new dataset to display in the graph.
        colors - An ArrayList of 0's or 1's corresponding to the colour of the points on the dataset.
